fields.question_text: Should we decrease the monthly residence fee?
fields.description: Last year left us with more additional funds than expected. Would everyone like a decrease in the monthly residence fee, or shall we keep it the same and use the additional funds to make improvements around the community?
The members of the board are proposing that this years remaining funds be donated to re-pave Main St. It has been far too long since the road was last paved and the years are definitely showing.

fields.question_text: New pool for the Community Center
fields.description: We are gathering a neighborhood consensus regarding the installation of pool in our community center. This would require a small donation from each interested party to get the funds together. If we all join up, we can combat the relentless Southern California heat!

fields.question_text: Allow for the painting of mailboxes
fields.description: Some members of our community have expressed their desire to personalize their mailboxes. This one is an all or nothin' kind of thing folks. But hey, if I want my mailbox to be a trout fish, why can't I?

fields.question_text: Repaint fence surrounding the Community Center.
fields.description: A few of us have decided that the fence surrounding our beloved Community Center is looking down in the dumps. Funds can be allocated for a painting service, or we can make a community bonding day out of it!

fields.question_text: Allocate funds to repair damaged pipes in Deer Creek Park.
fields.description: Our park is so nice. Those old rusty pipes are so dangerous and unpleasant. Lets get those pipes fixed up before one of our little kiddies goes and injures themselves.
